headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TTO Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: handle_name
parameters.description: The handle name of the TTO Creator Marketplace creator that you want to search for. The exact match is supported. Note : If you specify the handle name of a creator that is not on TTO Creator Marketplace yet, an error will occur.

parameters.name: video_ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the videos to filter the results by. Max size: 25. If this field is not specified, the results won't be filtered by video IDs.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The timestamp cursor of the video from which you want to retrieve subsequent videos. If the response parameter has_more is true , pass the returned cursor to this parameter in the next request to retrieve the subsequent videos. Default value: 0. By default, the most recent videos will be returned.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of posts to return for each request. Value range: 1-25. Default value: 10.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: posts
fields.description: The list of public posts of the creator.

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The display name of the creator.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the video. Example: 1234567890 .

fields.name: thumbnail_url
fields.description: Temporary URL for the video thumbnail. Validity period: around seven days. The expiration time is included in the URL after the x-expires parameter, in the format of an Epoch/Unix timestamp in seconds. Once the URL expires, you need to call /tto/tcm/creator/public/video/list/ to obtain a new URL.

fields.name: embed_url
fields.description: An embeddable link for this TikTok video. This URL can be used to embed the TikTok video in external websites or applications. If the privacy setting of the post is "Friends" or "Only you", the video will not be viewable through this link.

fields.name: likes
fields.description: Likes. Total number of likes on the video. Example: 100.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments. Total number of comments on the video. Example: 100.

fields.name: shares
fields.description: Shares. Total number of times the video has been shared. Example: 100.

fields.name: favorites
fields.description: Favorites. The total number of times the video has been added to favorites. Example: 100.

fields.name: video_views
fields.description: Video views. The number of times viewers who watched the video. Example: 100. Note : Replays will not be counted.

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: The time when the video was created, in Unix/epoch timestamp in milliseconds (UTC+0 time). Example: 1743090990000 .

fields.name: has_more
fields.description: Whether more videos are available. Supported values: true , false .

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: The timestamp cursor that marks the time of the last video returned in the current request. If has_more in the response is true , you can pass the value to the cursor parameter in your subsequent request to retrieve subsequent posts. Example: 1734031433000 .
